overview: Soekie is a family drama which focuses on the destructive effect of an impending divorce on family life. It is based on the book "Die Hele Dorp Weet" [translates to " The Whole Town Knows"] written by Santie Grosskopf.
tagline: Will Soekie get her father back from The Other Woman, or is the search to great.
title: Soekie
